jobApplication.title: Platform Architect - CRM, Travel
jobApplication.advertisement:
Platform Architect - CRM, Travel Posted 2 days ago by Eames Consulting Group Easy Apply New Salary negotiable City Of London , London Contract, full-time Be one of the first ten applicants
Platform Architect - CRM, Travel My client, a travel organisation is looking for a Platform Architect to join immediately on an initial 1-2 month contract. The platform Architect must have the following experiences; Provide working architecture outline demonstrating current functional capabilities and inter-operability with process/data flows Demonstrate gaps and how to fix Demonstrate how to replace/upgrade App and create flexibly/ability to make simple changes in-house Update estate as necessary Must have worked on a Travel based CRM This is an urgent requirement, please get in touch ASAP
Eames Consulting is acting as an Employment Business in relation to this vacancy.
Reference: 38612036 Bank or payment details should never be provided when applying for a job. For information on how to stay safe in your job search, visit SAFERjobs. Report this job
